content: Embedding {{productName}} or its part using JavaScript. Copy the JavaScript code below.

comment.text: This translation key is used for describing JavaScript code related to embedding a product using JavaScript. It appears on a page providing code to insert into the UI, and its purpose is to guide users on how to use it correctly.

usage.context:
<CodeWrapper height="fit-content">
 <CategorySubHeader className="copy-window-code">
 {`JavaScript ${t("CodeTitle")}`}
 </CategorySubHeader>
 <Text lineHeight="20px" className="preview-description">
 {t("JavaScriptCodeDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })}
 </Text>
 <CodeBlock config={config} scriptUrl={scriptUrl} theme={theme} />
 </CodeWrapper>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'yerləşdirilməsi' while technically correct, sounds slightly awkward and could be improved for naturalness in Azerbaijani. 'JavaScript istifadə edərək {{productName}}-in və ya onun bir hissəsini JavaScript vasitəsilə inteqrasiyası' would be a better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript istifadə edərək {{productName}}-in və ya onun bir hissəsini JavaScript vasitəsilə inteqrasiyası.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be more fluid. While grammatically correct, it feels slightly stiff. Using 'JavaScript vasitəsilə' makes the sentence smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: JavaScript vasitəsilə {{productName}}-in və ya onun bir hissəsinin yerləşdirilməsi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation maintains the formatting of 'Copy the JavaScript code below.' which might be more natural as an imperative instruction. While not incorrect, it could be slightly improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vložení {{productName}} nebo jeho části pomocí JavaScriptu. Níže uvedený kód JavaScriptu prosím zkopírujte.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "upotus käyttäen JavaScriptiä" could be more naturally translated as "JavaScriptin avulla" or "JavaScriptin avulla sisällyttäminen." "Upotus" is technically correct but sounds slightly awkward in this context.
While grammatically correct, the sentence could flow better by moving "JavaScript-koodi" to the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{productName}}-n tai sen osan upotus käyttäen JavaScriptiä. Alla oleva JavaScript-koodi on kopioitavissa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after 'JavaScript-ի միջոցով' is not ideal. It's more common to use a period or no punctuation in this context.

The English phrase 'Embedding' is better translated as 'Integrare' rather than 'Incorpora' in this context. 'Incorpora' suggests including something *within* something, while 'Integrare' conveys the sense of integrating or embedding a component into a larger system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integra {{productName}} o sue parti utilizzando JavaScript.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຖ່າຍບົດລະຫັດ JavaScript ດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້" is grammatically awkward. It implies copying the code, rather than using it. A more natural phrasing would suggest utilizing or implementing the code.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໃຊ້ ຫຼື ປະຕິບັດຕາມບົດລະຫັດ JavaScript ດ້ານລຸ່ມນີ້.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'spațiului' (space) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Embedding'. A better translation would be 'integrării' (integration) or 'includerea' (inclusion).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrarea {{productName}} sau a unei părți a acestuia cu ajutorul JavaScript. Copiați codul JavaScript de mai jos.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'කෝඩ්ප්‍රමාණය' (kōḍapramāṇaya) is a bit clunky. While technically correct for 'code block/amount,' it's not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'කෝඩ්' (kōḍ) or 'ජාවාස්ක්‍රිප්ට් කේතය' (jāvas̄krip̄t kētaya) which translates to 'JavaScript code'. A more natural phrasing might be: 'පහත ජාවාස්ක්‍රිප්ට් කේතය පිටපත් කරන්න.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses a full stop after "JavaScriptu" which is unconventional in this context. It's better to omit it for consistency with typical coding documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vloženie {{productName}} alebo jeho časti pomocou JavaScriptu. Skopírujte nižšie uvedený kód JavaScript.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "помоц́у" (pomoću) is a valid spelling, but depending on the specific context, "уз помоћ" (uz pomoć) might be more natural and common in Serbian. While not strictly incorrect, the latter enhances readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уграђивање {{productName}}-а или његовог дела уз помоћ JavaScript. Копирајте JavaScript код испод.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of genitive case 'JavaScript kod' is not ideal. It sounds slightly unnatural.  While grammatically correct, 'JavaScript kod' could be improved for flow.

The term 'представлений' (presented) is not the best translation for 'below' in this context. It sounds overly formal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of simply referring to the code that follows.
